Zain Mobarik
📚

Bookshelf

Books that have had a lasting impact on me, that I'd recommend to anyone interested in the topic area.

💻

Technology & Programming

Clean Code

by Robert C. Martin

Essential principles for writing maintainable and readable code.

The Pragmatic Programmer

by David Thomas & Andrew Hunt

Timeless advice on becoming a better software craftsman.

System Design Interview

by Alex Xu

Comprehensive guide to designing scalable systems.

🧠

Philosophy & Thinking

Thinking, Fast and Slow

by Daniel Kahneman

How we make decisions and the psychology behind our choices.

Meditations

by Marcus Aurelius

Timeless wisdom on stoicism and personal philosophy.

The Almanack of Naval Ravikant

by Eric Jorgenson

Insights on wealth, happiness, and decision-making.

📈

Business & Entrepreneurship

Zero to One

by Peter Thiel

Building companies that create new things and monopolies.

The Lean Startup

by Eric Ries

How to build sustainable businesses through innovation.

Blitzscaling

by Reid Hoffman

The lightning-fast path to building massively valuable companies.
